newsitem.title: USA: Keane Inc sets 2-for-1 stock split.
newsitem.headline: Keane Inc sets 2-for-1 stock split.

text.p: Keane Inc said Thursday that it has declared a two-for-one stock split of its common stock and Class B common stock.
The company said one share of Keane common stock will be issued to shareholders of record for every share of common stock and Class B common stock outstanding.
Shares are payable on or about August 29 to stockholders of record August 14.
Keane had 32,732,913 shares of common stock and 287,613 shares of Class B common stock outstanding as of July 24.
Keane is an application development, outsourcing and integration services firm based in Boston, Massachusetts.
